title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Drops 3.3% as All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Litecoin (LTC) fell 5.6% and Filecoin (FIL) declined 5.5%, leading the index lower.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2571.75, down 3.3% (-88.79) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

None of the 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: APT (-0.2%) and BCH (-0.7%).

Laggards: LTC (-5.6%) and FIL (-5.5%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The entire CoinDesk 20 Index dropped 3.3% with all 20 assets trading lower, led by significant declines in LTC (-5.6%) and FIL (-5.5%).
